cli.help.command.add_extension: add-extension  Ajoute done nan ekstansyon pack (chemen ekstansyon founisè a se legacy/schema-core)
cli.help.command.build: build          Konstwi yon konpozan pack ak atifak sipò
cli.help.command.components: components     Senkronize konpozan pack.yaml ak fichye anba components/
cli.help.command.config: config         Enspekte konfigirasyon rezoud la (pwovennans ak avètisman)
cli.help.command.doctor: doctor         Dyagnostike yon achiv pack (.gtpack) oswa yon repètwa sous (kouri validasyon)
cli.help.command.gui: gui            Zouti ki gen rapò ak GUI
cli.help.command.help: help           Afiche mesaj sa a oswa èd sou sou-kòmand yo bay yo
cli.help.command.inspect_lock: inspect-lock   Enspekte pack.lock.cbor (JSON estab sou stdout)
cli.help.command.lint: lint           Lint yon manifest pack, flow, ak modèl
cli.help.command.new: new            Kreye estrikti yon nouvo repètwa pack
cli.help.command.plan: plan           Jenere yon DeploymentPlan soti nan yon achiv pack oswa repètwa sous
cli.help.command.providers: providers      Èd eritaj pou ekstansyon founisè (chemen schema-core)
cli.help.command.qa: qa             Kouri QA konpozan epi estoke repons yo
cli.help.command.resolve: resolve        Rezoud referans konpozan epi ekri pack.lock.cbor
cli.help.command.sign: sign           Siyen yon manifest pack ak yon kle prive Ed25519
cli.help.command.update: update         Senkronize konpozan ak flow pack.yaml ak fichye anba rasin pack la
cli.help.command.verify: verify         Verifye siyati manifest yon pack
cli.help.option.cache_dir: --cache-dir <CACHE_DIR>   Ranplase repètwa kach la (pa default: pack_dir/.packc oswa GREENTIC_PACK_CACHE_DIR)
cli.help.option.config_override: --config-override <FILE>  Ranplasman konfig opsyonèl an TOML/JSON (kouch greentic-config)
cli.help.option.json: --json                    Sòti JSON lizib pa machin kote sa aplikab
cli.help.option.locale: --locale <LOCALE>         Lokal yo itilize pou mesaj CLI yo (fallback: LC_ALL/LC_MESSAGES/LANG/system/en)
cli.help.option.offline: --offline                 Fòse mòd offline (dezaktive nenpòt aktivite rezo)
cli.help.page.add_extension:
Ajoute done nan ekstansyon pack (chemen ekstansyon founisè a se legacy/schema-core)

Itilizasyon: greentic-pack add-extension [OPTIONS] <COMMAND>

Kòmand:
  provider    Ajoute oswa mete ajou antre ekstansyon founisè a
  capability  Ajoute oswa mete ajou yon antre òf kapasite

Opsyon:
  --locale <LOCALE>  Lokal yo itilize pou mesaj CLI yo
cli.help.page.add_extension_capability:
Ajoute oswa mete ajou yon antre òf kapasite

Itilizasyon: greentic-pack add-extension capability [OPTIONS] --pack-dir <DIR> --offer-id <ID> --cap-id <CAP_ID> --component-ref <COMPONENT> --op <OP>

Sèvi ak `greentic-pack add-extension capability --help` pou tout detay agiman yo.
cli.help.page.add_extension_provider:
Ajoute oswa mete ajou antre ekstansyon founisè a

Itilizasyon: greentic-pack add-extension provider [OPTIONS] --pack-dir <DIR> --id <PROVIDER_ID> --kind <KIND>

Sèvi ak `greentic-pack add-extension provider --help` pou tout detay agiman yo.

Konstwi yon konpozan pack ak atifak sipò

Itilizasyon: greentic-pack build [OPTIONS] --in <DIR>

cli.help.page.root:
CLI pack Greentic

Itilizasyon: greentic-pack [OPTIONS] <COMMAND>

Kòmand:
  build          Konstwi yon konpozan pack ak atifak sipò
  lint           Lint yon manifest pack, flow, ak modèl
  components     Senkronize konpozan pack.yaml ak fichye anba components/
  update         Senkronize konpozan ak flow pack.yaml ak fichye anba rasin pack la
  new            Kreye estrikti yon nouvo repètwa pack
  sign           Siyen yon manifest pack ak yon kle prive Ed25519
  verify         Verifye siyati manifest yon pack
  gui            Zouti ki gen rapò ak GUI
  doctor         Dyagnostike yon achiv pack (.gtpack) oswa yon repètwa sous (kouri validasyon)
  inspect        Alyas demode pou `doctor`
  inspect-lock   Enspekte pack.lock.cbor (JSON estab sou stdout)
  qa             Kouri QA konpozan epi estoke repons yo
  config         Enspekte konfigirasyon rezoud la (pwovennans ak avètisman)
  plan           Jenere yon DeploymentPlan soti nan yon achiv pack oswa repètwa sous
  providers      Èd eritaj pou ekstansyon founisè (chemen schema-core)
  add-extension  Ajoute done nan ekstansyon pack (chemen ekstansyon founisè a se legacy/schema-core)
  wizard         Èd asistan pack
  resolve        Rezoud referans konpozan epi ekri pack.lock.cbor

Siyen yon manifest pack ak yon kle prive Ed25519

Itilizasyon: greentic-pack sign [OPTIONS]

Senkronize konpozan ak flow pack.yaml ak fichye anba rasin pack la

Itilizasyon: greentic-pack update [OPTIONS] --in <DIR>
cli.help.page.verify:
Verifye siyati manifest yon pack

Itilizasyon: greentic-pack verify [OPTIONS]
cli.help.page.wizard:
Asistan entèaktif pou pake

Itilizasyon: greentic-pack wizard [OPTIONS]

Lanse meni prensipal asistan entèaktif la.
cli.help.page.wizard_add_component:
Ajoute yon konpozan nan yon pack lè w sèvi ak metadone li dekri tèt li

Itilizasyon: greentic-pack wizard add-component [OPTIONS] <REF_OR_ID>
cli.help.page.wizard_new_app:
Kreye yon eskelèt pack aplikasyon detèminis

Itilizasyon: greentic-pack wizard new-app [OPTIONS] <PACK_ID>
cli.help.page.wizard_new_extension:
Kreye yon eskelèt pack ekstansyon detèminis

Itilizasyon: greentic-pack wizard new-extension [OPTIONS] <PACK_ID>
cli.help.title: CLI pack Greentic
cli.qa.error.pack_cbor_required: pack.cbor pa jwenn (QA nan nivo pakè mande pack.cbor ak metadata)
cli.qa.prompt.select_option: Chwazi youn nan opsyon ki nan lis la.
cli.qa.warn.upgrade_deprecated: avètisman: --mode upgrade demode; itilize --mode update (alyas la kenbe pou konpatibilite)
cli.update.pack_yaml_updated: pack.yaml mete ajou (konpozan: +{}, -{}, total {}; koule: +{}, -{}, total {})
cli.verify.error.no_signatures_present: pa gen siyati nan manifès la
cli.wizard.dry_run.update_pack_yaml: tès san ekri: ta mete ajou pack.yaml
